Title: Orientation
Plot: Six weeks after Matt and the others wiped Sylar's mind, the Heroes attempt to go on living normal lives. We are introduced to "family" of carnies with abilities. Angela Petrelli and H.R.G. are in the works of restoring The Company while Claire makes new "friends" at school. Tracy is still hunting everyone from Building 26. Meanwhile, Hiro and Ando start a "Heroes for Hire" business.
GuestStars: Madeline Zima, Lisa Lackey, Ray Park, Dawn Olivieri, Rick Worthy, , Saemi Nakamura
